==== About me ====
Po-Hsu Lin is a Canonical employee who is currently working as a Software Engineer from the Hardware Enablement Team of the Ubuntu Kernel Team.

He is also a Traditional Chinese (more precisely, <nowiki>[[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Taiwanese_Mandarin|Taiwanese Mandarin]]</nowiki>) translator for Ubuntu and other open source projects like ElementaryOS, UBports, Pl@ntNet and etc.
